Start.label: Open poll
Start.tooltip: Opens the poll to start accepting votes!

Stop.label: Close poll
Stop.tooltip: Closes the poll to stop accepting votes!

Clear.label: Reset poll
Clear.tooltip: Resets the poll and remove all votes

Winner.label: Show Result
Winner.tooltip: Show the result of the poll

Min.label: Lowest vote option
Min.tooltip: Lowest value users can vote on

Max.label: Highest vote option
Max.tooltip: Highest value users can vote on

AllowMulti.label: Allow multi voting
AllowMulti.tooltip: If checked users can spam to vote multiple times on the same (or a different) option!

SendMessages.label: Send stream messages
SendMessages.tooltip: If checked the poll will send messages to chat when opened/closed/reset/winner is picked!

CloseOnReset.label: Close poll on reset
CloseOnReset.tooltip: If checked the poll will automatically close the poll when you reset it

Opened.value: ItsBoshyTime  The poll is now OPEN! Go ahead and vote by typing the number in chat ItsBoshyTime
Opened.label: Poll opened
Opened.tooltip: Message sent when poll is opened

Closed.value: ItsBoshyTime  The poll is now CLOSED! ItsBoshyTime
Closed.label: Poll Closed
Closed.tooltip: Message sent when poll is opened

Reset.value: ItsBoshyTime The poll has been cleared! ItsBoshyTime
Reset.label: Poll Cleared
Reset.tooltip: Message sent when poll is cleared

Result.value: And the winner is: {0} with {1} votes!
Result.label: Result
Result.tooltip:
Message sent when the result is checked
{0} = winning options
{1} = votes on the winning options

NoVotes.label: No votes
NoVotes.tooltip: Message sent when there was no votes registered

BtnDefaults.label: Restore Default Settings
BtnDefaults.tooltip:
Reset settings back to defaults.
Reload Scripts afterwards to see the changes in the user interface!
